body.para: Members of different interfaces have the same name. If you want to keep the same names, you must qualify the names. For more information, see Interfaces.
In some cases, this ambiguity can be resolved by providing an explicit prefix to the identifier via a using alias.

// XS0229.prg
FUNCTION Start AS VOID
RETURN
FUNCTION Test(x AS IListCounter) AS VOID
x:Count := 1
// Try one of the following lines instead:
// ((IList)x):Count := 1
// or
// ((Icounter)x):Count := 1
RETURN
INTERFACE IList
PROPERTY Count AS LONG GET SET
METHOD Counter AS VOID
END INTERFACE
INTERFACE ICounter
PROPERTY Count AS REAL8 GET SET
END INTERFACE
INTERFACE IListCounter INHERIT Ilist, ICounter
END INTERFACE
